content: **this pattern can be found free on my blog at the link above or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf version here ** the vinnie hat crochet pattern matches the vinnie sweater and is so easy to make this crochet hat pattern comes with written instructions and a video tutorial making it great for beginners pattern difficulty easy sizing based on head circumference hat has approximately 1 of negative ease and will stretch to fit head circumference/finished hat width/ finished hat length toddler 18-20 / 8 25 /7 child 20-21 /9 5 /8 teen/small adult 21-22 /10 /8 5 adult 22-23 /10 5 /9 all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
